title: "The Four Phases of Fascination and Energy Transformation"
first_phrase: In the previous text, the author discusses the four mental states that accompany the process of fascination and how they can be easily matched with the elements. The transformations are also present in the observation exercise of the black dot. In this last part, the author introduces the idea that fascination is energy in motion, and that to obtain it, the fascinator needs to increase their energy level. The author then links the seven planets of Ptolomeo to the different energy levels, in a similar fashion as the Indian "chakras." This section provides a fascinating insight into the link between mental states and energy levels.

Los siete planetas La fascinación es energía en movimiento, es un momento en el cual se va mas a los estrechos confines del ego y se perciben en el otro, o, en la práctica delante al espejo señalados más arriba, como uno, dos y tres. Para obtener es esencial que el fascinador cree en él un incremento del nivel de energía. En las tradiciones occidentales los planetas son los símbolos correspondientes a los diferentes niveles energéticos y tienen analogía con los “chakra” indianos. Aquí se trata de los siete planetas de Ptolomeo y entre estos debemos por lo tanto incluir el sol y la luna.
last_phrase: In conclusion, the practice of relaxation techniques and fascination can lead to an increase in energy levels and bring us closer to our true selves. The symbolism of the seven planets and the ancient tradition of passing through seven mirrors or rooms of different colors can aid in achieving this goal. By letting go of negative emotions and finding our center, we can experience a sense of lightness and warmth. Try incorporating these practices into your daily routine to enhance your well-being.
